text:
Benjamin Scott Falcone (born August 25, 1973) is an American actor, comedian and movie director. He is married to actress Melissa McCarthy, with whom he has two children.
Falcone appeared in small roles of McCarthy's movies "Bridesmaids", "Identity Thief", "The Heat", and Life of the Party and co-starred in "What to Expect When You're Expecting" and "Enough Said".
Falcone made his directorial debut in 2014 with "Tammy". He would go on to direct "The Boss" and "Life of the Party", all of which starred McCarthy.
